p: Four hundred and ten (410) serum samples were tested by the NP-ELISA assay. Forty-four (44) sera with an SRH antibody titer equal to 0 mm 2 (13.9% of samples) were analyzed to confirm their seronegativity. Overall, 42 sera have been confirmed seronegative (95.5%) and 2 sera were seropositive (4.5%).
